help-file.title: PSYCHEPORTER
help-file.content:
Some Psionicists grow bored with the inability to efficiently travel between the planes, therefore a small sect has chosen to enhance their transit abilities. These astral travelers, or Psycheporters, have many means of improved transit at their disposal. They have also learned a means to travel on their native plane with little or no threat to themselves.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- none!
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: astral affinity 46th level: spacial focus
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 12th circle: thought beacon
